# renderMode

**Instance Property**

Defines how particle cells are rendered into the layer.

## Declaration

```swift
var renderMode: CAEmitterLayerRenderMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values for render modes are shown in [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/emitter-modes]. The default value is [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayerRenderMode/unordered].

## Emitter Geometry

- **emitterPosition**: The position of the center of the particle emitter. Animatable.
- **emitterShape**: Specifies the emitter shape.
- **emitterZPosition**: Specifies the center of the particle emitter shape along the z-axis. Animatable.
- **emitterDepth**: Determines the depth of the emitter shape.
- **emitterSize**: Determines the size of the particle emitter shape. Animatable.
